alert.note: Alert for Blair; Cambria; Clearfield; Huntingdon; Mifflin; Northern Centre; Northern Clinton; Southern Centre; Southern Clinton; Union (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 03 at 1:29AM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...A BRIEF PERIOD OF SNOW WILL RESULT IN LOCALLY HAZARDOUS TRAVEL CONDITIONS... HAZARDS...A band of snow accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. A quick snow accumulation up to 0.5 inch will result in slick road conditions. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 122 AM EST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from near Lock Haven to 15 miles southeast of Punxsutawney and moving southeast at 30 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Altoona, State College, Lock Haven, Bellefonte, Lewisburg, Hollidaysburg, Tyrone, Mifflinburg, Ebensburg, Portage, Park Forest Village, Carroll, Woodward, Northern Cambria, Boalsburg, Pleasant Gap, Philipsburg, Lamar, Stormstown and Lemont. For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the Woodland and Lewisburg-Williamsport exits, specifically from mile markers 132 to 203. This includes Interstate 99 from mile markers 26 to 85. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
